segments.text: This kitchen is a total mess, disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreading on the floor is gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in it, probably ruining her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, just wiping that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a wobbly stool, dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging for one, like it's not enough already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside is neat, but inside it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats like that, so unsanitary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the sloppiness here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the faucet, for goodness' sake.
segments.speaker: PAR
